name: creaking
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
creak
When a door, floorboard, etc. creaks, it makes a long low sound when it moves or is moved: The door creaked on its hinges. I heard the floorboards creak as he crept closer. Synonym
squeak Compare
screech verb
